subject: RE: [junit] XML TestRunner
msgSnippet: Check out ANT  The Java build tool. It includes a TestRunner that produces XML as well as a reporting task that uses XSLT to
messageBody:
Check out ANT <http://jakarta.apache.org/> The Java build tool. It includes
a TestRunner that produces XML as
well as a reporting task that uses XSLT to produce HTML from the XML.
